name: Adventure Medieval Clicker
description:
Adventure Medieval Clicker is an RPG clicker idle game

Defeat monster to gain golds. Manage your golds to upgrade your heroes and mercenary. There's 5 Different area and endless floor you can venture.

*** Features ***
- Over 20+ Mercenary you can hire to help you fight against monster
- Unlock various skill to strengthen your Heroes
- Over 50+ Artifact available, each artifact gives unique effect
- Equip your Heroes with item like Weapon, Armor, etc to make it Stronger
- Evolve your equipable item to upgrade them
- And many more feature!
